version_name: 6.1.1: bug fix. With some iOS versions
9.0.1:•VoiceOver bugfixVersion 9.0:•If your device supports Touch ID

version_description:
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

Questions
Please call us on 0900 - 92 16 (usual call charges apply). Lines are open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Bug fix
Bug fix

•You are now able to increase your daily limit to a maximum of €5.000
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

Questions?
Call us on 0900 - 92 16 (usual call charges apply). Lines are open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

•Transfers of up to €250,000 using the app and e.dentifier.
•Easily cancel any transfer inadvertently made from an account with an insufficient balance.
•A few minor bug fixes.

The menu has been updated! The ‘Tools’ tab has been replaced with ‘Self-service’, and ‘Manage’ is now ‘Settings’. The nine squares in the top left are also new.
• Visit ‘Self-service’ to view your ABN AMRO products. Here, you can do more and more of your banking, such as blocking your card.
• To give your account a name or enable or disable the fingerprint feature, go to ‘Settings’.
• Check out the nine squares in the top left to find out about our other apps.
Some minor improvements.

At this moment Mobile Banking is not optimised for Face ID. Therefore it has been disabled.
We expect this feature to be available in one of the upcoming updates.
•Receive an alert if your balance changes? Set a Payment alert.

New: Mobile Confirmation. Now you can confirm your orders by simply logging in to the Mobiel Bankieren App. You will use your phone instead of your e.dentifier!
Turn it on? Go to ‘Settings > Log in and confirm > Mobile Confirmation.’

•The log-in screen has a new design, but the log in procedure hasn't changed.
•If you have a question, check out the revamped contact page in the app. We have compiled a list of frequently asked questions to help you do your day-to-day banking.
•Good to know: the app is ready for iOS 13, the iPhone software update that Apple will be releasing in September.

Lost your debit card? You can now block your card even faster in the Mobile Banking app. Go to Settings > Debit cards and wearables > Debit card settings.

We regularly release new app updates, which are always in line with the latest technologies introduced in iOS. If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.

•Finally: option of using Face ID to log in or make transfers.
•Useful: you can now also view your mortgage details.
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
- A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

•You can open a current account straight away using the app. All you need is your passport.
•We have updated our Privacy Statement. Tap the (i) in the top left of the log-in screen to read it.
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

From June 2018, you will no longer be able to use the ‘old’, light-green e.dentifier1. Visit abnamro.nl/ed for more information.
- You can now view the different loan parts of your ABN AMRO mortgage in the app under 'Self-service'.
- A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

• If you have a mortgage with a construction account, you can quickly check the amounts spent and remaining under ‘Self-service’.
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.

• We now always check the name you enter against the IBAN. A message will be shown if it is incorrect. Visit abnamro.nl/ibannaam for more information.
• You can now also make calculations when applying for a new product in the app.
• Got started with Begeleid Beleggen? You can now use the app to set your investment goal, target amount, term and deposit.
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.

• If you would like to view your mortgage in your account overview, add it by going to ‘Settings > Accounts’ and selecting your mortgage.
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

• New for iDEAL payments: scan the QR code and complete the payment in the app.
• If you have a mortgage with ABN AMRO, you can now tap ‘Self-service’ to view and change the same details as on Internet Banking.
• If you have a construction account, you can now also submit your expenses through the app. That’s useful!
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

• New for iDEAL payments: scan the QR code and complete the payment in the app.
• If you have a mortgage with ABN AMRO, you can now tap ‘Self-service’ to view and change the same details as on Internet Banking.
• If you have a construction account, you can now also submit your expenses through the app. That’s useful!
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.
A few functional improvements and bugfixes.

- If you do not yet have an ABN AMRO current account, our Mobile Banking app now makes opening one even easier.
- If you use the app to manage multiple accounts, you can now select the account used to register for Grip or &Meer.
- A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

•Logging in is now easier. If you use Touch ID, you will only see the fingerprint scanner. If you open the app using your identification code, you will only see the keyboard.
•You can now view and delete your savings account in the app under ‘Self-service’.
•If you have given your accounts your own photo, you can now see the photos under ‘Self-service’, making it easier to recognise your accounts.
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

• If you have moved house, or have a new mobile number or email address, you can easily update your details in the app without using your e.dentifier.
• Cancel printed statements now and help save the environment.
• You can now also close your savings account in the app under ‘Self-service’.
• A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

•You can now open an account in the app with your driving licence!
•A few functional improvements and bug fixes.

- Want to block your card or update your personal details? You'll find the links you need under ‘Self service’.
- Improved app functionality.

- Check it out! Our log-in screen has had a makeover.
- Tikkie requests from the Mobile Banking app are now sent even faster.
- Improved app functionality.

• Searching your transactions is now even easier. Click the magnifying glass and enter your search key.
• Want to start banking with ABN AMRO? You can now use your driving licence as an ID again.
• Improved app functionality.
- A few functional improvements and bugfixes.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That's good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We make changes or add features, for instance.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

We have updated the log-in screen. Logging in using your identification code will now display a new animation.
You can now use the Mobile Banking app to scan iDEAL and Tikkie QR codes. If you're free to choose the amount to pay, when making a donation for instance, you can easily set the preferred amount in the app.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

We have updated the log-in screen. Logging in using your identification code will now display a new animation.
You can now use the Mobile Banking app to scan iDEAL and Tikkie QR codes. If you're free to choose the amount to pay, when making a donation for instance, you can easily set the preferred amount in the app.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That's good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We make changes or add features, for instance. The Mobile Banking app now has a brand new app icon.
If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

Got a Rabobank account? You can now add it to your overiew. Soon, you can also add current accounts held with other banks. You will then have all your accounts in one place in the Mobile Banking app and on Internet Banking.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

Lost your debit card? You can now block your card even faster in the Mobile Banking app. Go to Settings > Debit cards and wearables > Debit card settings.

We regularly release new app updates, which are always in line with the latest technologies introduced in iOS. If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

- If you have an ABN AMRO mortgage, you’ll find the updated mortgage summary in the app, showing the remaining mortgage amount. You can also change the mortgage type and interest rate yourself.
- If you invest using ABN AMRO's Begeleid Beleggen, you may have noticed that the summary in the app has been revamped.
- Lost your debit card? You can now block your card even faster in the Mobile Banking app. Unblocking it is just as easy.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That's good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We add new features or improve existing ones. That's why we regularly release updates, which are always in line with the latest technologies introduced in iOS.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That's good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We make changes or add features, for instance.

If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

•The log-in screen has a new design, but the log in procedure hasn't changed.
•If you have a question, check out the revamped contact page in the app. We have compiled a list of frequently asked questions to help you do your day-to-day banking.
•Good to know: the app is ready for iOS 13, the iPhone software update that Apple will be releasing in September.

•If you invest independently with ABN AMRO, you will notice a new dashboard in the app within the next few days. This dashboard shows your portfolio’s current value and performance. To see the dashboard, go to Account overview > Self-Directed Investing account.
•We have revamped your debit card overview. You can now swipe between your active cards to view your details. If you want to have a debit card replaced or blocked, simply press the yellow buttons.

• Does your mortgage include a home construction account? Check out your mortgage statement for your remaining balance. Go to ‘Self service > Mortgage’.
• For independent investors: your overview now shows the status of your pending orders.
• We regularly release updates. If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

• Make quick, easy payments with Apple Pay.
• For your convenience: notifications about changes in your mortgage are now included in your mortgage overview.
• Does your mortgage include a home construction account? You can now view your account in your mortgage overview.
• Do you use multiple profiles in Mobile Banking? You can now add and remove them without logging in. Swipe left on the profiles and tap ‘Manage profiles’.

• Make quick, easy payments with Apple Pay.
• For your convenience: notifications about changes in your mortgage are now included in your mortgage overview.
• Does your mortgage include a home construction account? You can now view your account in your mortgage overview.
• Do you use multiple profiles in Mobile Banking? You can now add and remove them without logging in. Swipe left on the profiles and tap ‘Manage profiles’.

• Does your mortgage include a building fund? You can now also see your submitted claims and the transactions.
• For independent investors: your overview contains even more detailed information on your portfolio.
• Improved app functionality.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That’s good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We make changes or add features, for instance.
If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

•Do you have a mortgage with us? With this update your loan component page has a new design and looks as fresh as the previously updated mortgage screens.
•Improved app functionality

• Improved VoiceOver in the transfer screen.
• In the overview of your building fund, the descriptions of all credit and debits have been added and it is possible to see all credit, debits and invoices in a separate overview.

• Improved VoiceOver in the transfer screen.
• In the overview of your building fund, the descriptions of all credit and debits have been added and it is possible to see all credit, debits and invoices in a separate overview.
• Improved app functionality and bug fixes.

• If your debit card is lost, stolen or damaged you can now request a replacing card fast, secure and easy within your app.
• With this update, you can also scan a QR code for iDEAL, Tikkie, or login in Internet Banking when you are already logged in. Just tap the icon on the upper left side of your screen.
• Improved app functionality

The screens showing your accounts and transactions have been revamped: the pages are more pleasant to read. Transactions are now easier to find: besides specifying the date, the screen also shows you on what day of the week there was activity in your account.
For independent investors: the updated screen tells you a lot more about your portfolio. You can now view the return on your investments by day, by year or even from the date you started investing. Another new feature: you can choose whether you just want to see the value of your unsold units or you want the total value to include the return on the units you’ve sold before.

The screens showing your accounts and transactions have been revamped: the pages are more pleasant to read. Transactions are now easier to find: besides specifying the date, the screen also shows you on what day of the week there was activity in your account.
For independent investors: the updated screen tells you a lot more about your portfolio. You can now view the return on your investments by day, by year or even from the date you started investing. Another new feature: you can choose whether you just want to see the value of your unsold units or you want the total value to include the return on the units you’ve sold before.

This app update includes a number of minor improvements. Any new and improved features will be posted here.

Tip: always use the app’s latest version. This will ensure that your app continues to work properly. You can set up automatic updates for the app in the settings of your phone or tablet. Go to Settings, tap iTunes Store and App Store and tick App Updates.

Any questions? Please don’t hesitate to contact us. You can find our contact details on the ABN AMRO website. Or tap the question mark in the app.

Are you a regular Mobile Banking user? That's good to hear! The app makes your banking quick and easy. We are also continuously working on improving the app and making it even easier to use. We add new features or improve existing ones. That's why we regularly release updates, which are always in line with the latest technologies introduced in iOS.
If you want all the latest updates, you can go to Settings > iTunes Store or App Store and enable automatic updates.

New to ABN AMRO? You can now open your current account with an international passport. Convenient, because you don't have to leave your house to do so.

You can now log in faster to Internet Banking by scanning the QR code with the ABN AMRO app and confirming it with Face ID or Touch ID.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings > iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.

The Bankmail overview has been updated. Now, you can view your messages by tapping on the cards.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.

Navigation in the app has been improved. The menu bar can now be found at the bottom of the screen, which makes navigation much easier. You can also tap 'Help' in this menu bar. A summary of FAQs and our contact details will appear.

From now on, you can view Bankmail by going to the bell icon in the top left-hand corner of the screen. You will receive a notification as soon as you have a new Bankmail.

This version contains some minor improvements.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.

This version contains some minor improvements.


Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.

This version contains some minor improvements.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.

This version contains some minor improvements.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.
Please update the ABN AMRO app to the latest version. This way, you can continue to use the ABN AMRO app.
Please update the ABN AMRO app to the latest version. This way, you can continue to use the ABN AMRO app.

View the details of transactions in a new and useful screen. Tap on a specific transaction in the Transactions overview to view all the details. From this screen you can instantly send a Tikkie request, share the transaction details or ask for a refund of a direct debit. This new screen will become available in the coming weeks. To make sure you get access to this new screen, you will need to update the app to version 11.6 or any newer versions.

This version contains some minor improvements.
Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.
From now on, you can find the task list by going to the bell icon in the top left-hand corner of the screen. The task list works as usual.

This version contains some minor improvements. Following this update, you will be able to copy the description of a transaction to your clipboard.

Never miss an update again? On your phone, go to Settings. Tap iTunes Store and App Store, and enable automatic updates.
This version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app.

From this version onwards, you can log into the app to arrange something specific. This comes in very useful when you just need to block your card. Or if you want to speak to a specific Customer Service department directly. How does that work? You are automatically redirected to the app after tapping a button on the ABN AMRO website or through a search engine. Also new: you can view and adjust all your account options for your current account straight away. We've also made it easier to become a client using an iPad.

From this version onwards, you can log into the app to arrange something specific. This comes in very useful when you just need to block your card. Or if you want to speak to a specific Customer Service department directly. How does that work? You are automatically redirected to the app after tapping a button on the ABN AMRO website or through a search engine. Also new: you can view and adjust all your account options for your current account straight away. We've also made it easier to become a client using an iPad.

From this version onwards, you can log into the app to arrange something specific. This comes in very useful when you just need to block your card. Or if you want to speak to a specific Customer Service department directly. How does that work? You are automatically redirected to the app after tapping a button on the ABN AMRO website or through a search engine. Also new: you can view and adjust all your account options for your current account straight away. We've also made it easier to become a client using an iPad.

From now on, you will be able to see when the next payment is scheduled for standing payment orders. You can now select which account details you want to share with a third party, such as a mortgage lender or digital household expenses tracker. Don't worry: this option is deactivated as standard. If you want to use this feature, you will need to give your permission first. The Help page in the app also has a more user-friendly design.

This version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app. The Help feature has been improved for use with VoiceOver and the process of opening a current account using the ABN AMRO app is now easier.

This version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app. The Help feature has been improved for use with VoiceOver and the process of opening a current account using the ABN AMRO app is now easier.
You can now view your scheduled appointment with an ABN AMRO adviser. In addition, this version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app.
You can now view your scheduled appointment with an ABN AMRO adviser. In addition, this version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app.

The settings can now be accessed through the 'Profile' button. Under 'Profile', you can also view your personal information. If any of the information is incorrect, simply change your address, email address or telephone number. When you open the new version for the first time, a blue pop-up will help you get started. This version also contains various improvements for a better user experience of the app.
This version contains several improvements for a better user experience of the app.

The search function in your account has been improved. You can now use multiple filters at the same time. We have also made some existing functionalities more user friendly. You can now add appointments to your calendar. In addition, several technical improvements have been made.

• This version will soon let you use the revamped transaction overview for your account. You will be able to see at a glance which debits are still being processed and when a scheduled debit is due to be made.


• If you open a different app while you are chatting with one of our employees, you will receive a push notification as soon as the employee replies to your message.


• Business clients can now also use the app to identify or re-identify themselves when asked to do so by ABN AMRO.
